mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.pwd, u.user_name, u.nickname, u.phone, u.addr, u.addr_detail, u.gender, u.user_photo, u.self_intro, u.is_self_intro_public, u.is_user_photo_public, u.is_secession, u.is_suspension, u.role, u.secession_Date, u.suspension_date, IFNULL(SUM(e.is_score_plus), 0) AS evaluate_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN evaluate_list e ON u.user_id = e.evaluated_user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY u.user_id;

SELECT u.user_id, u.pwd, u.user_name, u.nickname, u.phone, u.addr, u.addr_detail, u.gender, u.user_photo, u.self_intro, u.is_self_intro_public, u.is_user_photo_public, u.is_secession, u.is_suspension, u.role, u.secession_Date, u.suspension_date, IFNULL(SUM(e.is_score_plus), 0) AS evaluate_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN evaluate_list e ON u.user_id = e.evaluated_user_id WHERE u.nickname = #{nickname} GROUP BY u.user_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT user_id, user_name, nickname, user_reg_date, is_secession FROM users
user_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
user_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
nickname like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
) countTable

SELECT nickname FROM users WHERE user_id IN
#{item}
